private static class TXTReader.AddLayerAction extends org.geotools.swing.action.SafeAction
AddLayerAction class: Nested class inside of TXTReader. Handles the "add layer" button action.

  • Method Details

    • action

      public void action(ActionEvent e)
      Creates a SwingWorker to perform the TXTReader.addLayer() method. Displays an error message if the action fails.
      Specified by:
      action in class org.geotools.swing.action.SafeAction
      Parameters:
      e - the event triggering this action.
